# Chris Bornholdt

 

[City Council](https://www.rifleco.org/Directory.aspx?DID=27)  
Title: Mayor Pro Tem  
Phone: (970) 618-6873  
[Email](mailto:cbornholdt@rifleco.org)

- **Elected 1st term**: Nov 2021 - Nov 2023
- **Elected 2nd term**: Nov 2023 - Nov 2027
- **Appointed Pro Tem**: Nov 2023 - Nov 2025
